short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows what the world would look like without blood types

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PaSME Pty Ltd and their CEO Daniel Lewis show their support for the Australian Red Cross Blood Service's #MissingType campaign. Let's spread the word and show everyone what a world without the A, B and O blood types would look like!

Learn more about donating blood, visit http://www.donateblood.com.au

This extension adds a button to the top left of your web page - which when clicked simply shows what the world would look like without blood types.
